clinical_study.brief_title: Hypnosis Mask: a New Approach to Management of Pain in Medical Imaging
clinical_study.official_title: Hypnosis Mask: a New Approach to Management of Pain in Medical Imaging

brief_summary.textblock: The prostatic biopsies echo-guided are a painful and stressful. The purpose is to test a new medical device created recently, " Hypnos-Pro ", wich uses connected technologies. This connected device is a mask with diodes coupled with an audio headset and a touch pad. This connected mask is an another option to induce an hypnotic state for our patients. the objective is to value hypnotic mask effectiveness, to reduce the level pain and anxiety for the patients who benefit a prostatic biopsies echo-guided with local anesthesia.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at 20 minutes after the removal of the probe
primary_outcome.description: Measure the pain in the scale from 0 to 10

secondary_outcome.measure: State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ou STAI forme Y-A
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, at 20 minutes after the removal of the probe

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of positive response of satisfaction of the patient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 20 minutes after the removal of the probe
secondary_outcome.description: The question is: Would you do prostate biopsy punctures under the same conditions in a month? (Yes: effective method, No: ineffective method).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of positive response of satisfaction of the operator
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 20 minutes after the removal of the probe
secondary_outcome.description: The question is: In your opinion, has the gesture been made optimally? (Yes/ No).

arm_group.description: An experimental group receive a standard pain management and benefit the hypnotic mask (Hypnos pro).

intervention.description: 4 injections of 2 cc of lidocaine for a Periprostatic nerve block

The mask HYPNOS pro stimulates the imagination of the user by means of 6 diodes among 3 by eye. Just before the introduction of ultrasound probe, the patient put the hypnotic mask and choose a session.Twenty minutes after the removal of the probe, an healthworker assess the painful patient with the visual analogue scale VAS, after this the patient fulfill the STATE- TRAIT Anxiety Inventory (STAI) form Y-A.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient eligible for prostate biopsies
- Having accepted and signed the consent, for performing a prostate biopsy ultrasound examination
- No contraindication to the gesture
- Supporting the left lateral decubitus
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient isolation contact / droplets
- Patient with hearing and / or epilepticus and / or dementia and / or having a history of stroke and / or allergic to lidocaine
- Person unable to consent, or benefiting from a system of legal protection (tutelage / curatorship).
- Patients with epileptic seizures.
- Patients with known allergies to plastics and other resins that may develop allergic contact dermatitis.
- Patients who are hypersensitive to radio frequency.
- Patients with Rocephin administration before the gesture
